column4: hey to dl wine it says http://wine.budgetdedicated.com/aptdappermain

you have to add that to your sources.list
you have to add that to your sources.list
open a terminal and do gksudo gedit /etc/apt/sources.list, once in there just paste that line anywhere in it. Save. Then back in the terminal do sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install wine
did you do what I said?
you added that repo and did "sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install wine"?
it doesn't matter, doing seperate should do the same thing

pastebin your sources.list
you have to delete that #
also there should be another line in there that looks like this, deb http://wine.budgetdedicated.com/apt dapper main
